directions: Grind the masala together to a fine paste
saute the sliced onions with the currypatta till golden
add diced tomato and saute till pureed
add the soaked bombil and fry for few minutes
now add the masala paste and roast till smell of khopra vanishes and masala releases out oil
add water along with potato, brinjal, drumsticks and kokam and allow to simmer. add the kokam or imli and salt for taste
check the potato pieces. switch off gas when potato is done
ingredients: 1 medium potato cut into large chunks
2 drumsticks cleaned n cut in 2 inch pieces
1 piece of kokam or imli to taste
3 finger khopra piece Do not roast
title: bombil batatyacha haldoni
